channel.title: More Problems
channel.description:
:( sorry to keep asking for help guys trying to sort this out my self but i'm stuck right ive portfowarded n everything i just cant log into my private server i'm using pur3scape server thats working fine but when i try loggin with a moparscape client
it says no response from server try using diffrent world
in client its says 12:09:06] Logging into (tom1, *****) [12:09:06] Your UID is: 80834207 [12:09:11] Couldn't open output stream to log file tom1-20110429.log
on the server gui its saying
[2011/04/29 12:09:06] [AnonymousIoService-12]: New session from: /127.0.0.1:54677 [2011/04/29 12:09:06] [AnonymousIoService-12]: Session has been closed: /127.0.0.1:54677 [2011/04/29 12:09:11] [AnonymousIoService-13]: New session from: /127.0.0.1:54680
i don't know what the hells going on but i cant seem to login :confused: any help would be great thanks tried to put as much info as i have

item.title: More Problems
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

ukscape:

could u tell me what this means " Couldn’t open output stream to log file tom1-20110429.log " and thank you

It means that the client (MoparScape’s) wasn’t able to open a connection on your server to connect to it.

Read full topic

item.title: More Problems
item.dc:creator: @ukscape ukscape
item.description:
@ukscape wrote:

could u tell me what this means " Couldn’t open output stream to log file tom1-20110429.log " and thank you

Read full topic

item.title: More Problems
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

Most private servers can’t be connected to by the MoparScape client because its built to handle basic servers. If your server files have been modded in anyway (such as custom items, required client ID’s) it wont work. Best action would be to get your own client so you can make sure everything runs smoothly.

Read full topic

sorry to keep asking for help guys trying to sort this out my self but i’m stuck right ive portfowarded n everything i just cant log into my private server i’m using pur3scape server thats working fine but when i try loggin with a moparscape client

it says no response from server try using diffrent world

in client its says

[12:09:06] Your UID is: 80834207
[12:09:11] Couldn’t open output stream to log file tom1-20110429.log

i don’t know what the hells going on but i cant seem to login

any help would be great thanks tried to put as much info as i have
